transcript.text: Preparing beef stew
is quick and easy.
It is possible to decline it in different ways.
Start by putting olive oil in a pan to heat it up.
Next, take a large onion and cut it into thin strips.
Once the oil is hot, add the onion to the pan.
Sauté the onion well over medium heat until translucent, stirring regularly.
In parallel, start cutting the meat, I chose boneless beef shank for this stew.
Beef shank is the best meat for a stew because it is tender so well cooked.
Cut the meat into large chunks.
Once the onions are translucent, place the pieces of meat on top. It is possible to replace the pieces with minced meatballs or chicken, drumsticks or thighs. To mix together.
Brown the onions well with the meat. Next,
season with salt, pepper and garlic powder.
If not, add garlic powder.
Invite to subscribe to the channel and enable notifications.
Don't forget to turn on notifications.
Add a beef stock cube (optional but adds a lot of flavor).
Cover with water and mix everything one last time.
Cover everything with water and add sugar.
Add 2 tablespoons of sugar (optional but adds lots of flavor).
Simmer under pressure for 30 minutes, covering everything.
Cut the vegetables during this time.
Cut 200g of green beans into small pieces.

Take a large zucchini and cut it into small pieces.
Take a large zucchini and cut it into small pieces.

Cut in such a way that it goes unnoticed by children.
Cut in such a way that it goes unnoticed by children.

Advise to cut larger pieces to avoid crushing.
Advise to cut larger pieces to avoid crushing.

The zucchini cooks quickly, so cut into 4 or 6.
The zucchini cooks quickly, so cut into 4 or 6.

Peel 4 large potatoes and cut them into large dice.
Peel 4 large potatoes and cut them into large dice.

Can add tomato.
Can add tomato.

Open the casserole slowly so as not to burn yourself.
Open the casserole slowly so as not to burn yourself.

Cook the meat under pressure until it is tender and tender.
Cook the meat under pressure until it is tender and tender.

After 30 minutes of cooking, add the vegetables (green beans, courgettes, potatoes).
After 30 minutes of cooking, add the vegetables (green beans, courgettes, potatoes).

Add a good big bunch of chopped fresh parsley.
Add a good big bunch of chopped fresh parsley.

Mix gently and adjust the seasoning if necessary.
Mix gently and adjust the seasoning if necessary.

Replace the lid and cook without pressure for 10 minutes.
Replace the lid and cook without pressure for 10 minutes.

Stir gently so as not to break the potatoes.
Stir gently so as not to break the potatoes.

Dilute a large tablespoon of flour in cold water.
Dilute a large tablespoon of flour in cold water.

Mix to avoid lumps and pour into the sauce.
Mix to avoid lumps and pour into the sauce.

Cook for another 5 to 10 minutes until the sauce thickens.
Cook for another 5 to 10 minutes until the sauce thickens.

Stir gently.
Stir gently.

Check the seasoning and adjust if necessary.
Check the seasoning and adjust if necessary.
Replace the lid and cook without pressure for 10 minutes.
Stir gently so as not to break the potatoes.
Dilute a large tablespoon of flour in a small volume of cold water and mix to avoid lumps.
Pour the mixture into the sauce to thicken it.
Stir gently and cook for another 5 to 10 minutes until the sauce thickens nicely.
Taste and enjoy.
I hope you enjoyed this recipe, see you soon.
